description:
This special live event will be me taking the recently released Deepin 23 for a quick spin in a virtual machine.  Deepin is one of those Linux distros that almost never disappoints me, especially in the "looks" department.  I will also interact with the folks hanging out in the YouTube chat!

WANT TO SUPPORT THE CHANNEL?

title: A Quick Look At Deepin 23 (DT LIVE!)
